summary:
BMW, short for Bayerische Motoren Werke, is a famous German company that makes fancy cars and motorcycles. It was started in 1916 and first made airplane engines. Later, they began creating cars and motorcycles. BMW is known for its high-quality vehicles and has brands like Mini and Rolls-Royce.

The company is based in Munich and makes cars in many countries. It is one of the biggest vehicle producers worldwide and is owned mostly by the Quandt family, who saved it from trouble years ago. BMW also has a cool racing history.
title: BMW
